headline.main: M'ARTHUR BEATS OFF TWO DIVISIONS; BURMA LINE FIRM UNDER PRESSURE; JAPANESE MENACE ISLE NEAR JAVA; HEAVY LOSS TO FOE Bataan Defenders Rout 'Desperate Venture' by 'Best' Enemy Troops ATTEMPT WAS FORESEEN Many Japanese Drown as They Try to Flee When Pincer Drive and Frontal Thrust Fail M'ARTHUR DEFEATS 2 DIVISIONS OF FOE

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Feb. 2 -- General Douglas MacArthur's forces have "repulsed with heavy Japanese losses" a furious attempt by two full Japanese divisions to encircle the heroic but dwindling United States and Filipino garrison on the Bataan Peninsula, the War Department announced today.
snippet: WASHINGTON, Feb. 2 -- General Douglas MacArthur's forces have "repulsed with heavy Japanese losses" a furious attempt by two full Japanese divisions to encircle the heroic but dwindling United States and Filipino garrison on the Bataan Peninsula, ...

byline.original: By JAMES B. RESTONSpecial to THE NEW YORK TIMES
